about_the_game:
A brutal post-apocalyptic fighting game set in the ruins of civilization. Fight to survive. Fight to rescue. Fight for redemption.


About This GameStep into the decaying streets of a ruined metropolis in City of Ashes, a visceral third-person isometric fighting game where every punch, kick, and improvised weapon strike carries weight. Set in a post-apocalyptic world where a devastating pandemic and the collapse of governments have plunged humanity into chaos, you play as a former MMA fighter searching for his kidnapped daughter in a city overrun by cannibalistic gangs.

Face brutal hand-to-hand combat as you fight through deranged enemies, gang leaders, and their twisted arenas to rescue the only family you have left.

Game Pillars

  • Melee Combat with Combos
    Master a dynamic melee combat system designed for fluidity and impact. Chain powerful combos, block and counter attacks, and adapt to enemy fighting styles in adrenaline-fueled encounters.

  • Special Melee Abilities
    Unleash devastating special attacks to turn the tide of combat. From crushing takedowns to cinematic finishing moves, your skills will evolve with your journey.

  • RPG Progression System
    Level up your fighter with a straightforward RPG system. Unlock new moves, enhance your stats, and customize your combat style to suit your playstyle.

  • Loot and Improvised Weapons
    Scavenge the urban wasteland for gear and loot to upgrade your abilities. Use improvised weapons—pipes, bats, crowbars, and more—to gain an edge in battle.

  • Photorealistic Environment
    Explore a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic world brought to life with photorealistic visuals. Every ruined street, crumbling skyscraper, and derelict arena immerses you in a gripping atmosphere of decay and danger.

    A Story of Survival and Vengeance

    In the aftermath of a global pandemic and government collapse, you’ve struggled to survive with your daughter. But when a cannibalistic gang ambushes you and kidnaps her, your world is shattered. Fueled by desperation and rage, you’ll stop at nothing to bring her back—even if it means taking on the city’s most feared gang in their blood-soaked arena.

    The World of City of Ashes

    Navigate through hauntingly realistic ruins, from abandoned city and crumbling bridges to makeshift arenas where gangs hold brutal tournaments. Every corner of the city tells a story of its downfall, with eerie remnants of its once-thriving civilization now overtaken by violence and decay.

    Are You Ready to Fight for What Matters Most?

    Face the ultimate test of survival in City of Ashes. Fight through a city that’s as unforgiving as its inhabitants, and prove that hope can survive even in the darkest times.

content_descriptors.notes: City of Ashes contains strong language, intense violence, blood and gore. This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (AVX2 support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 or AMD AMD Radeon™ RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) / Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 55 GB available space

short_description: A post-apocalyptic 3rd person fighting game in streets and ruined building of a decaying city, taking player through the remnants of civilization, battling deranged cannibal on a quest to rescue your daughter.
